0x0000 100220 BSR poll
0x0001 800034 MOK R20,0x1
0x0002 800035 MOK R21,0x1
0x0003 100100 BSR fib
0x0004 020000 CLR
0x0005 FFFFE0 ADK R0,0XFFFF
0x0006 700100 JZE R0,done
0x0007 400060 JMP lup
0x0008 A029E MOV R30,R20
0x0009 A02BF MOV R31,R21
0x000a 400140 JMP fin
0x000b 020000 CLR
0x000c 852B6 ADR R22,R21,R20
0x000d A0295 MOV R21,R20
0x000e A02D4 MOV R20,R22
0x000f 300216 MOM 0x10,R22
0x0010 010000 RET
0x0011 A0380 MOV R0,R28
0x0012 020000 CLR
0x0013 E00020 ADK R0,0x1
0x0014 7002C0 JZE R0, found
0x0015 400220 JMP poll
0x0016 A03A0 MOV R0,R29
0x0017 010000 RET
